column4: I tried the network-manager that you suggested and it royally screwed my system. There is some kind of conflict between what it does and the vmware network modules
there were alot of kernel error messages so I removed network-manager. I wonder what was the problem...
That is why you don't use vmware
Sorry, I guess it is not for you
I don't use vmware, and it works surprisingly well
yeah... I think it was due to a specific module that does bridged networking between guest and host
Maybe I'll try to get rid of that one since I never use it
If you are able to, nm is a really cool app
I just wanted to try it... I guess it's mostly useful with a laptop which I don't have
Actually, it does wired, wireless, and vpn
If you do any 2 of those, it can't be beat
